roleset.name: add to, enhance, adding to
roleset.note: SUPPLEMENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'supplement' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from supplement.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: supplement as subject
example.text: But in private meetings yesterday, Budget Director Richard Darman argued that [only $1.5 billion in new federal appropriations]-1 are needed [*-1]-2 [*]-2 to supplement existing resources.

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mary supplemented the meagre payments from John's life insurance policy with various acts of minor shoplifting.
example.arg: the meagre payments from John's life insurance policy
with various acts of minor shoplifting

example.name: All args
example.text: Their supplementation of strings in their arrangements helps set the band apart as one of today's most adventurous musical innovators.
